problem_statement: Build a lightweight waitlist application that allows users to join a queue using their email address and receive a unique referral code. Users can share their referral code with others to earn priority in the waitlist. Each successful referral boosts the referrerâ€™s position upward in the queue while maintaining fair ordering, preventing abuse, and enforcing strict referral rules. The system must handle queue reordering deterministically, prevent circular or self-referrals, and work without a database persisting state in a JSON file instead. The application should expose a small REST API and be implemented using a React frontend and a Node.js/Express backend.
